body.desc: Click the character to learn, and make sure speaker is on.

modal.title: Set up practice settings
modal.howToPractice: Write down without looking at the screen. If there is a character you can't remember, skip it and listen to the next character. Then, mark that character as difficult and practice again and again.

about.text:
This app is a combined version of the above 2 sites. 

 It is developed with the aim of helping students who have started learning Japanese Language and find difficult in remembering characters. 

 You can learn how a character is correctly drawn and how it is pronounced on `Learn` page, able to mark characters difficult, and can practice those characters randomly in `Practice` Page. Choose a practice type, set delay and write down what you hear and then check if they are correct when the audio has finished.

notFound.text: Our apologies, but we couldn't find that page. Is it possible that you found a bad link?
